name: Select all Password Requirements, verify help text and error on bad password

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: STABLE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Stable - TM4J key found Cypress master-prod run report (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
Password Requirements
————————————————————————————
1. Select "At least one lowercase letter"
2. Select "At least one uppercase letter"
3. Select "At least one number"
4. Select "At least on symbol"
5. Save
inline.expectedResult: Error preview reads correctly, verify the error message appears correctly when creating a new account with a password that does not meet the requirements.
